metadata.title: CVE-2015-4471 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Off-by-one error in the lzxd_decompress function in lzxd.c in libmspackbefore 0.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (bufferunder-read and application crash) via a crafted CAB archive.

criterions.comment: libmspack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
cabextract: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
